name: Mr. Arcades Crane Curse
description:
[Controls]

Switch Machine | Q and E | L1 and R1

Control hook  | WASD | Left Stick

Activate Hook | Space | X

Open Menu | Escape | Start

[Story]

for inexplicable reasons, you find yourself in a mysterious arcade hall.
To escape this arcade you have to collect as many objects as possible from the crane games, but be quick, your time is running out!
You feel something creeping up behind you, and all the objects feel more alive than you would expect... 
Some of the Plushies look human-like, and... they're breathing?
Whatever happened to them, you can't let it happen to you!
Perhaps some of the objects inside the machines belong together, maybe they even net more points as a complete set?
Who knows... some of the objects have also snuck into the crane game to sabotage you, so be careful!
